“It’s a saying they have,
that a man has a false heart in his mouth for the world to see,
another in his breast to show to his special friends and his family,
and the real one,
the true one,
the secret one,
which is never known to anyone except to himself alone,
hidden only God knows where.”

- História da Igreja do Japão
Father João Rodrigues
via Shogun (1975), James Clavell
